Package org.neo4j.kernel.api.impl.schema

Interface SchemaIndex

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, DatabaseIndex<IndexReader>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReadOnlyDatabaseSchemaIndex, WritableDatabaseSchemaIndex
    public interface SchemaIndex
extends DatabaseIndex<IndexReader>
    Partitioned lucene schema index.

    • Method Summary

      Verifies uniqueness of property values present in this index.

    • Method Detail

      • verifyUniqueness

        void verifyUniqueness​(NodePropertyAccessor accessor,
                      int[] propertyKeyIds)
               throws IOException,
                      IndexEntryConflictException
        Verifies uniqueness of property values present in this index.
        Parameters:
        accessor - the accessor to retrieve actual property values from the store.
        propertyKeyIds - the ids of the properties to verify.
        Throws:
        IndexEntryConflictException - if there are duplicates.
        IOException
        See Also:
        UniquenessVerifier.verify(NodePropertyAccessor, int[])

      • verifyUniqueness

        void verifyUniqueness​(NodePropertyAccessor accessor,
                      int[] propertyKeyIds,
                      List<Value[]> updatedValueTuples)
               throws IOException,
                      IndexEntryConflictException
        Verifies uniqueness of updated property values.
        Parameters:
        accessor - the accessor to retrieve actual property values from the store.
        propertyKeyIds - the ids of the properties to verify.
        updatedValueTuples - the values to check uniqueness for.
        Throws:
        IndexEntryConflictException - if there are duplicates.
        IOException
        See Also:
        UniquenessVerifier.verify(NodePropertyAccessor, int[], List)
